article_title: Cruz trying to overcome Trump’s lead in SC
article_text:
Texas senator wooing evangelical voters before Feb. 20 primary

Cruz sits second in S.C. polls during a year when voters want political outsiders

Once pals with Trump, they now are fighting each other as Iowa caucuses approach

article_metadata.news-keywords: ted cruz, donald trump, marco rubio, ben carson, jeb bush, nikki haley, sc, south carolina, republican, gop, 2016, presidential, primary, election, tea party, social conservatives, evangelicals
article_metadata.description: After seeing Ted Cruz speak in Columbia this month, David Edwards turned to his son and recalled seeing another Republican who ran for the White House.
